reviews.review: This game is a great stress reliever, and it's great fun when you audio with someone on skype. It seems to run on even the lowest grade of pcs. I've never had an issue with it, and I've enjoyed every moment I've spent playing it. Definately a must buy. If you are afraid of zombies and putting off buying this game because of it, please note that you eventually figure out how the zombies are coded and it becomes more of a 'kill the target' game rather than 'oh sweet baby Rassilon, I'm being attacked by zombies' game. There are skill types so you can play with the weapons that you are most comfortable with. For me that is Melee, and for one of my friends, that's Medic. They usually dress up the game for each holiday, so that's always incredibly entertaining.
Muy buen juego on-line. A mi parecer más divertido que left 4 dead. Además tiene una comunidad enorme con modelos, skins y mapas a monton. Es muy recomendable.
If you like to wack zombies and brutal violence......or you just like to fire guns.......this game is for you,lol.....

Good old fassioned team based wave killing. Tons of servers to play on, only a few dif enemy types, but they each have their own place in this game, as well as many player classes that each have a benefit to the group.

If Killing Floor was an actor it would be Danny Dyer.  It's a cheeky little shooter.  Not as good as Left for Dead 2, more of a straight to DVD sort of game.  Like our friend Danny, it has it's moments.  The slo motion shootouts that occur now and again are fun, and it pulls in the weapon buying method used by counterstrike.  Shoot, earn, spend.  Would I reccommend?  Yes, but wait for one of the sales and pick up for a few quid.  No one in their right mind would pay for a blu ray copy of Danyy Dyers Hardest Men Volume 2, but you'd watch it on tv with a beer and laugh at the wonder of Danny "I believe in ufos" Dyer

Killing Floor é um excelente jogo, surgiu a partir de um mod de Unreal Tournament 2004. Foi lançado em 2009 e ganhou bastante destaque na época, alcançando o topo de vendas da Steam. Em 2012 a Tripwire notificou que o jogo havia vendido mais de 1 milhão de cópias, um número considerado, pois só tem portabilidade para computador. O jogo é no estilo survivor horror, focado no multiplayer. O player terá que trabalhar em equipe para conseguir vencer as hordas de monstros zumbis, que surgirão no decorrer do jogo, além das hordas irem aumentando em número aparecerá uma variedade de monstros maior, alguns no estilo mini-boss. Colocando dificuldade e variando o combate, isto exige que os players se organizem e façam estratégias, não é possível ganhar as partidas se todos ficarem correndo pelo mapa, a estratégia principal é manter o time
por perto. Como é um jogo de classes, será preciso interação entre elas, cada classe tem a sua função especifica que juntas tornam o grupo muito forte capaz de sobreviver. Apesar de ser um jogo sem história e o inimigo ser apenas a IA. Não é um jogo fácil e para se alcançar níveis altos e jogar em dificuldades maiores é preciso dedicação e aprendizado de jogo. A produtora faz um trabalho fantástico para manter este jogo vivo, ainda está muito ativo em 2013. A Tripwire liberou um SDK onde a comunidade desenvolveu uma infinidade de mapas novos, e até mods de jogo. Há servidores onde é possível se jogar com uma quantidade muito grande de jogadores e não apenas 4 como no tradicional. Além disso há sempre eventos em determinadas épocas do ano onde o jogo passa por uma atualização e os mapas e inimigos ganham uma cara nova para a festividade, por exemplo no dia das bruxas. É um jogo simples de uma maneira geral, para mim é mais um jogo que vence devido a sua simplicidade. Como é um jogo leve pode ser jogado em qualquer computador comprado atualmente, notebook etc. E até em computadores mais antigos, as constantes promoções trazem jogadores novos ao game. Acredito que este jogo possa ser jogado por pessoas que não estão muito dentro dos games, é um ótimo jogo introdutório. Não posso mencionar a trilha sonora é interessante, acredito que sejam músicas desenvolvidas para o jogo, pois elas se encaixam perfeitamente no ambiente do jogo. É um jogo que deve ser lembrado, dizem que na sua versão mod, inspirou no desenvolvimento do maior e mais famoso Left 4 Dead. Possuo 50 horas de jogo e recomendo, principalmente para quem não tem um PC potente e quer ter um jogo de qualidade, que pode ser jogado todos os dias.
6/5 you need this awesome game
Честно говоря, примитивная концепция и механика, но чертовски затягивает. Да и спустя 4 года после выпуска игра всё ещё пополняется официальным контентом.

I've played enough to give my say on this game. FIrst of all, if you're into to Horde mode type games then this game is designed all around it and has a more logical system of what weapons you can have equipped by how heavy they are and if you can afford them. you have access to a large portion of them (Rest is DLC based) but as long as you have money, you can buy it, no stupid ' You must be level 5 to use this weapon'. 

This game has different perks which all have their pros and cons for dealing with the enemies and require teamwork and variety in these perks to succeed effectively on the harder difficulties and I will say, the last 2 difficulties are how the game is meant to played if you want a true co-op experience and challenge.

The game is a little on the buggy side on some bits but nothing serious or gamebreaking for me.

Overall I think this game has done well for the £5 I bought it for and is worth the price it is currently but if you're not sure about it still then wait for the Summer, Halloween or Christmas event where it has a 75% discount

My score is a 8.8/10

Ótimo jogo de sobrevivencia por rodada. A cada rodada você mata os monstros e ganha dinheiro para comprar armas. Basicamente, SOBREVIVA! Tambem a experiencia, conforme você utiliza um tipo de arma você irá ganhar experiencia para o mesmo. Com isso facilitando a compra e o dano que você irá causar.
it destroys friendships
A game that just lets you get your anger out.

As someone who's stood by this game for years as one of the best co-op shooters for pc, I give you my personal recommendation for Killing Floor. It's a game for 6 players to work together to overcome the threat of an onslaught of zombies and monsters. With a vast variety of weapons to choose from to take each creature out. I have invested over 300 hours of gameplay into Killing Floor and still have not beaten it. It takes a very long time to finish 100% and that's why I love this game. A variety of monsters to kill and an ever larger selection on weapons to kill with. Also it's only $20. Get it now!

Let's be honest here: The vanilla game, while fun for a while and good for a quick game of shooting things in the face, isn't nearly as fun as the mods that people have ands still are making for this game. Want low gravity? Want a turret from Portal to help you out? Want to sling six-shooters like Wyatt-Flippin'-Earp? There's mods for that, and so much more.

Better than the Left 4 Dead  series, by far. To compare it to Left 4 Dead is an insult.  If you liked Left 4 Dead, you will LOVE this. Classes, weapons, purchasable weapons, upgrades, waves of zombies, waves ending with a boss fight, and best of all no " go from A to B" but instead constant roaming around the map to NOT get your bones chewed on by these bastards. 

You can skip on the DLCs.

I particularly like this one because of it's gameplay system. It's not story based, and it's not like CoD Zombies. You pick a class, level it as you play it, and just take on waves and waves of zombies. Though they are called ZEDs here.

This game is so simple that it is really fun to pick up and play for a small amount of time. The only problem I have with it, seems to be that the servers aren't run through Valve, and it's run through your own modem, which is ok, but it's annoying to have to port forward for a game that sells itself as "multiplayer." The gun feel is really good, and it can get extremely difficult on the higher settings. Downloadable maps from the Steam Community allow for much more replay value.
